title: Physics of band-filling correction in defect calculations of solid-state materials
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17675-17683
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01528B, Paper

Harshan Reddy Gopidi, Lovelesh Vashist, Oleksandr I. Malyi
Defect formation in insulators can result in supercell size dependence of band filling. This paper discusses an in-depth understanding and practical guidance of how such band-filling corrections should be accounted for in the defect calculations.
